Luxury, comfort and exclusivity

Control Jets is a mexican aviation private jet charter, headquartered in Toluca, Mexico. We offer all types of aviation and jet services. From jet rental, aereal taxi, film locations and any services that required a private jet. We serve entrepeneurs, artists, film producers, executives or families that need a reliable service, who is always ready, trustable, luxurious and discrete.

We are the prime mexican jet charter. We are distinguished by our personalized world class service and our 24/7, all year round, availability. We work closely with you to adjust to your needs and our pilots are trained by the best training centers in the USA. Our planes are kept under the highest quality controls and maintenance, to guarantee your maximum security in each and every flight.
